reviewText: We've been waiting for these for a long time.  Quality isn't the best but certainly acceptable.  Would have rated a 5 except for the fact that these are strangly enough recorded on DVD-R disks (you can tell by looking because they are a purple color on the recorded side instead of silver or gold).  For this reason, they wouldn't play on one of my older DVD players.  If I didn't know better, I'd think they were bootleg copies.  Don't know why they did this!  Otherwise, they're worth the wait.

yes ok so i bought this DVD along with season 1, don't buy this one.. but it from another company.. for real . it like won't work on my DVD players and i have about 4 of them it only worked on my laptop...kinda upset with that...

I am a huge fan of Doug and this is perfect for any collector. These DVD's won't be sold in stores so get them while you can here. I just hope Amazon gets a deal for the last two seasons. (HINT, HINT)

With the deal struck between Nickelodeon and Amazon, we finnaly have various titles being released that I thought we would never see. Thank you Amazon! Now if only you could strike the same deal with Buena Vista Home Entertainment and get titles like X-Men, Spiderman, MMPR, and Digimon in Region 1 boxsets. I would gladly pay my hard earned money for titles like that.

This is an Amazon exclusive and won't be sold in stores. Amazon worked out a deal with nickelodeon to "Burn on demand" meaning upon receiving an order that Amazon will create the dvd and insert then ship it to the buyer...

Doug's season-2 disc set includes 3 dvd's that have a total of 26 episodes, Audio and picture quality in these dvd's are excellent

Disc-1
1. Doug takes the case (Doug tries solving the case involving Beebe's missing radio)
2. Doug's secret song (Doug is worried that Patti may watch a music video he had made declaring his love for her)
3. Doug's got no gift (Doug tries making Patti a birthday present after he waste all his money and can't afford the beet-ball he originally wanted to buy her)
4. Doug vs the klotzoid zombies (Klotzenstein turns everyone into zombies with his zombie chips and its up to Quail-man to save them)
5. Doug's secret admirer  (Doug starts receiving admiring notes in his school locker from a mystery girl that he hopes will be Patti)
6. Doug's on tv (Doug and Skeeter go on the kiddie show "Kiddie korral" and get humiliated after Roger tapes it and plans to show it to everyone in school)
7. Doug's dinner date (Doug hates liver and onions but does everything he can to make himself like it, even hypnosis - in time for Patti's dinner party)
8. Doug meets fentruck
9. Doug's on stage
10. Doug's worst nightmare (Doug's worst nightmare as Roger falls for his sister Judy)

Disc-2
1. Doug's derby delemma
2. Doug's on his own
3. Doug meets the rulemeister
4. Doug's  a genius
5. Doug saves roger (Roger finds out what its like to be picked on when Percy Femur comes to school)
6. Doug's big news
7. Doug's a big fat liar
8. Doug wears tights
9. Doug on the trail
10. Doug meets robobone

Disc-3
1. Doug pumps up (Doug enters a fitness contest)
2. Doug goes hollywood (When a famous hollywood director comes to town, everyone in Bluffington wants to star in his next movie)
3. Doug's hot ticket
4. Doug's dental disaster (Doug is worried about going to the dentist and starts day-dreaming about how Smash-Adams would handle it)
5. Doug's lost weekend (Doug's addicted to playing his new video game for the weekend and never starts his homework)
6. Doug's lucky hat (Doug finds a hat and believes its a good luck hat when good things start to happen)

I hope these dvd sets sell enough for Amazon to quickly offer the last 2 seasons of the original Doug, not the evil "disney doug" and start offering my other favorites "The rugrats" "Catdog" and "The Angry beavers" season sets...

I was so excited when I saw that Amazon had Doug on DVD - but to my dismay, the DVDs won't play on my DVD player OR in my laptop (a Macbook Pro). So basically I just wasted $34.  I hate to give my beloved Doug a 1 star rating but I have no other choice.

Buyer beware - the DVDs may not play for you.
Thank-you Nicktoons Rewind! Even if the episodes aren't in correct order, or even the right episodes at all,  at least they're on DVD.

My favorite show when I was growing up.  The picture quality isn't the remastered look we usually see with DVD cartoon releases, but if this is the only way to get Doug (which it is, by the way, unless you count iTunes) then I could care less.  The best part of Doug was always the soundtrack anyways and that sounds marvelous on my system.  Thank you Amazon.  Keep it up...and please bring us the other seasons (and Rugrats)!!!!!

The adventures of Nick's Doug continues in Season 2.  Doug continues to live his life in the suburbs of Bluffington with the help of his family, friends and alter egos (i.e. Quailman, Smash Adams, etc.)

For those of you who are definitely Doug fans, you can tell the difference in the show's animation.  That's because most to all of the animation was sent overseas to France's Ellipse Programme, but it shouldn't deter you from watching it.

Some of the memorable episodes are:
-Doug's Dinner Date
-Doug's Secret Admirer
-Doug vs. the Klotzoid Zombies
-Doug Lucky Hat (the music score's a definite must-listen)
-Doug's Lost Weekend
-Doug's Worst Nightmare
-Doug's Dental Disaster

I highly recommend this (along with Doug-Season 1).  Lord-willing, Nickelodeon and Amazon.com will finally release the final season soon.
